mapper.update: UPDATE /* com.deft.crud.customer.model.dao.CustomerMapper#modifyExtCustomerStatus() */ TBL_EXT_CUSTOMER_DETAIL E SET E.CUSTOMER_STATUS = CASE WHEN (E.CUSTOMER_STATUS = '기존고객') THEN '해지고객' ELSE '기존고객' END WHERE E.CUSTOMER_NO = #{ customerNo }
mapper.select: SELECT /* com.deft.crud.customer.model.dao.CustomerMapper#selectAllCustomer() */ C.CUSTOMER_NAME , CP.COMPANY_NAME , E.EMP_NAME , EX.CUSTOMER_STATUS , CP.BUSINESS_STATUS , EX.CUSTOMIZATION_DATE , C.CUSTOMER_NO FROM TBL_CUSTOMER C LEFT JOIN TBL_CUSTOMER_COMPANY CP ON (C.CUSTOMER_COMPANY_NO = CP.CUSTOMER_COMPANY_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_EMP_INFO E ON (C.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_EXT_CUSTOMER_DETAIL EX ON (C.CUSTOMER_NO = EX.CUSTOMER_NO) WHERE EX.CUSTOMER_STATUS IS NOT NULL

SELECT /* com.deft.crud.customer.model.dao.CustomerMapper#selectCustomerList() */ C.CUSTOMER_NO , C.CUSTOMER_NAME , CP.COMPANY_NAME , CP.BUSINESS_STATUS , E.EMP_NAME , EX.CUSTOMER_STATUS FROM TBL_CUSTOMER C LEFT JOIN TBL_CUSTOMER_COMPANY CP ON (C.CUSTOMER_COMPANY_NO = CP.CUSTOMER_COMPANY_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_EMP_INFO E ON (C.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO) JOIN TBL_EXT_CUSTOMER_DETAIL EX ON (C.CUSTOMER_NO = EX.CUSTOMER_NO) WHERE EX.CUSTOMER_STATUS = '기존고객'

SELECT /* com.deft.crud.customer.model.dao.CustomerMapper#selectAllAnalysisCustomer() */ C.CUSTOMER_NAME , C.CUSTOMER_NO , CP.COMPANY_NAME , E.EMP_NAME , AN.CUSTOMER_STATUS , CP.BUSINESS_STATUS , LISTAGG(P.PRODUCT_NAME, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY P.PRODUCT_NO) AS PRODUCT_NAME FROM TBL_CUSTOMER C LEFT JOIN TBL_CUSTOMER_COMPANY CP ON (C.CUSTOMER_COMPANY_NO = CP.CUSTOMER_COMPANY_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_EMP_INFO E ON (C.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_ANA_CUSTOMER_DETAIL AN ON (C.CUSTOMER_NO = AN.CUSTOMER_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_CUSTOMER_PRODUCT CD ON (AN.CUSTOMER_NO = CD.CUSTOMER_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_PRODUCT P ON (P.PRODUCT_NO = CD.PRODUCT_NO) WHERE CD.CUSTOMER_NO IS NOT NULL GROUP BY C.CUSTOMER_NAME, CP.COMPANY_NAME , E.EMP_NAME, AN.CUSTOMER_STATUS, CP.BUSINESS_STATUS, C.CUSTOMER_NO

SELECT /* com.deft.crud.customer.model.dao.CustomerMapper#selectCustomerInfo() */ C.CUSTOMER_NAME , C.CUSTOMER_ADDRESS , C.CUSTOMER_NO , CP.COMPANY_NAME , E.EMP_NAME , E.EMP_NO , C.CUSTOMER_EMAIL , CP.BUSINESS_STATUS , EX.CUSTOMER_STATUS , C.CUSTOMER_PHONE , CP.NUMBER_OF_EMPLOYEES , NVL(C.CUSTOMER_FAX, ' ') AS CUSTOMER_FAX , CP.COMPANY_REVENUE , CP.BUSINESS_TYPE , CP.CUSTOMER_COMPANY_NO , CP.HOMEPAGE , CP.COMPANY_ADDRESS , CP.COMPANY_REGIST_NO , EX.CUSTOMIZATION_DATE FROM TBL_CUSTOMER C LEFT JOIN TBL_CUSTOMER_COMPANY CP ON (C.CUSTOMER_COMPANY_NO = CP.CUSTOMER_COMPANY_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_EMP_INFO E ON (C.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_EXT_CUSTOMER_DETAIL EX ON (C.CUSTOMER_NO = EX.CUSTOMER_NO) WHERE C.CUSTOMER_NO = #{ customerNo, jdbcType=INTEGER }

SELECT /* com.deft.crud.customer.model.dao.CustomerMapper#selectAnalysisCustomerInfo() */ C.CUSTOMER_NAME , C.CUSTOMER_ADDRESS , C.CUSTOMER_NO , CP.COMPANY_NAME , CP.CUSTOMER_COMPANY_NO , C.CUSTOMER_EMAIL , CP.BUSINESS_STATUS , C.CUSTOMER_PHONE , NVL(C.CUSTOMER_FAX, ' ') AS CUSTOMER_FAX , AN.CUSTOMIZATION_LEVEL , AN.CUSTOMIZATION_POSIBILLITY , CP.BUSINESS_TYPE , CP.COMPANY_REGIST_NO , CP.NUMBER_OF_EMPLOYEES , CP.COMPANY_REVENUE , CP.HOMEPAGE , CP.COMPANY_ADDRESS , LISTAGG(P.PRODUCT_NAME, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY P.PRODUCT_NO) AS PRODUCT_NAME , E.EMP_NAME , E.EMP_NO , AN.CUSTOMER_STATUS FROM TBL_CUSTOMER C LEFT JOIN TBL_CUSTOMER_COMPANY CP ON (C.CUSTOMER_COMPANY_NO = CP.CUSTOMER_COMPANY_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_EMP_INFO E ON (C.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_ANA_CUSTOMER_DETAIL AN ON (C.CUSTOMER_NO = AN.CUSTOMER_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_CUSTOMER_PRODUCT CD ON (AN.CUSTOMER_NO = CD.CUSTOMER_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_PRODUCT P ON (P.PRODUCT_NO = CD.PRODUCT_NO) WHERE C.CUSTOMER_NO = #{ customerNo } GROUP BY C.CUSTOMER_NAME, C.CUSTOMER_NO, CP.COMPANY_NAME, C.CUSTOMER_EMAIL, CP.BUSINESS_STATUS , C.CUSTOMER_PHONE, NVL(C.CUSTOMER_FAX, ' '), AN.CUSTOMIZATION_LEVEL, AN.CUSTOMIZATION_POSIBILLITY, CP.BUSINESS_TYPE , CP.COMPANY_REGIST_NO, CP.NUMBER_OF_EMPLOYEES, CP.COMPANY_REVENUE, CP.HOMEPAGE, CP.COMPANY_ADDRESS , E.EMP_NAME, AN.CUSTOMER_STATUS, C.CUSTOMER_ADDRESS, CP.CUSTOMER_COMPANY_NO, E.EMP_NO

SELECT /* com.deft.crud.customer.model.dao.CustomerMapper#selectBusinessActivity() */ BA.ACTIVITY_NO , BA.CUSTOMER_NO , BA.BUSINESS_SUBJECT , BA.BUSINESS_TYPE , NVL(BA.BUSINESS_LOCATION, ' ') AS BUSINESS_LOCATION , BA.BUSINESS_PURPOSE , NVL(BA.BUSINESS_CONTENTS, ' ') AS BUSINESS_CONTENTS , BA.WRITING_TIME , BA.ACTIVITY_START_TIME , BA.ACTIVITY_END_TIME , E.EMP_NAME FROM TBL_BUSINESS_ACTIVITY BA LEFT JOIN TBL_EMP_INFO E ON (BA.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO) WHERE BA.CUSTOMER_NO = #{ customerNo }

SELECT /* com.deft.crud.customer.model.dao.CustomerMapper#selectBusinessActivity() */ BA.ACTIVITY_NO , BA.CUSTOMER_NO , BA.BUSINESS_SUBJECT , BA.BUSINESS_TYPE , NVL(BA.BUSINESS_LOCATION, ' ') AS BUSINESS_LOCATION , BA.BUSINESS_PURPOSE , NVL(BA.BUSINESS_CONTENTS, ' ') AS BUSINESS_CONTENTS , BA.WRITING_TIME , BA.ACTIVITY_START_TIME , BA.ACTIVITY_END_TIME , E.EMP_NAME FROM TBL_BUSINESS_ACTIVITY BA LEFT JOIN TBL_EMP_INFO E ON (BA.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO) WHERE BA.ACTIVITY_NO = #{ activityNo }
SELECT /* com.deft.crud.customer.model.dao.CustomerMapper#selectEmpName() */ EMP_NO , EMP_NAME FROM TBL_EMP_INFO WHERE EMP_NAME LIKE '%'||#{ term }||'%'

SELECT /* com.deft.crud.customer.model.dao.CustomerMapper#selectEmpInfo() */ E.EMP_NO , E.EMP_NAME , J.JOB_NAME , D.DEPT_NAME FROM TBL_EMP_INFO E LEFT JOIN TBL_JOB J ON (E.JOB_CODE = J.JOB_CODE) LEFT JOIN TBL_DEPARTMENT D ON (E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE)
